overview: Pearl and Bypola are at it again. At the height of their musical success this dynamic duo is finally turning a new leaf in life, then their world gets flipped upside down,Between dirty cops, kidnappings, shoot outs, and tags being on their heads; it's hard to believe that they're not the bad guys or the Baddest of the Bad. The final film in the Philly based trilogy.
title: Bad Guy 3
